title: Can we write a meaningful essay without a title? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think we cant. Because, the title is the way to get other attention. For example, you will read an article in newspaper because you interested with the title. So it is same problem with essay. As simple, title can represent what you are talking or writing.

The essay is not the title, so yes. So what is the function of the title? Provides a brief description of the theme or topic for potential readers and to give librarians a place to file it. Without a title, you would still need to refer to it somehow, maybe “the one about …”
